artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: single storey building with gold domed center section and gold trim on central doorway; "BIBLIOTHEQUE" above doorway; four relief masks, two on each side of building, labeled left to right: "PAS/CAL, JEAN RACINE, VICTOR HUGO, MAETE/RLINCK"
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [BIBLIOTHEQUE]
title: Bibliothéque, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
